text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-55WL 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-55WL 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-55WL 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-55WL 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-55WL 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!
